articles.title: Trump, Obama hold dueling rallies twice in one day as crucial midterm vote looms
articles.description: President Trump and former President Obama faced off in dueling campaign rallies for the second time on Friday evening, when the pair spoke to crowds in Indianapolis and Atlanta to highlight why voters should elect their party’s candidates.
articles.content: President Trump and former President Obama faced off in dueling campaign rallies for the second time on Friday evening, when the pair spoke to crowds in Indianapolis and Atlanta, respectively, to highlight why voters should elect their party’s candidates. Oba… [+2651 chars]

articles.author: Matt Richardson
articles.title: Kavanaugh accuser referred to DOJ for false statements, Grassley’s office announces
articles.description: Senate Judiciary Committee Chairman Chuck Grassley on Friday referred a woman who accused Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh of raping her “several times” in the backseat of a car to the Justice Department for “materially false statements” and “obstruction…
